section.title: Managing and Monitoring JAIN SLEE Services
View Service Summary
section.para: In the top, at the summary section, some details regarding the Service can be seen, such as the Component ID (in Description), the Version, the State and its Parent Component (JSLEE Server).

section.title: Monitor JAIN SLEE Service Availability over time
section.para: By accessing the MONITOR tab it's possible to see a graph showing the availability of the Service over time.

section.title: Activate/Deactivate a JAIN SLEE Service
section.para: Under the OPERATIONS tab, an operation for changing the state of the service can be found: Change Service State.
Clicking on the operation, a new pane opens so the parameters can be selected:

note.para: As any operation on &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;, this operation can be scheduled for a later time, have a defined timeout and/or include additional notes.

section.para: Clicking on the SCHEDULE executes (if Immediately is selected) or schedules the operation. After being executed, it's shown in HISTORY, Completed Operations. Clicking on it shows the result(s).

section.title: Retrieve SBB Entities
section.para: In the OPERATIONS tab, an operation to list all SBB Entities belonging to a specific service is available, named Retrieve Sbb Entities.

note.para: As any operation on &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;, this operation can be scheduled for a later time, have a defined timeout and/or include additional notes.

section.para: Clicking on the SCHEDULE executes (if Immediately is selected) or schedules the operation. After being executed, it's shown in HISTORY, Completed Operations. Clicking on it shows the result(s).
